import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormFeedback, } from "reactstrap"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { Formik } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; const SignupSchema = Yup.object().shape({ name: Yup.string() .required("Lütfen isim giriniz.") .min(2, "Too Short!") .max(50, "Too Long!"), surname: Yup.string() .min(2, "Too Short!") .max(50, "Too Long!") .required("Required"), email: Yup.string() .email("Invalid email") .required("Required"), company: Yup.string() .min(2, "Too Short!") .max(50, "Too Long!") .required("Required"), phone: Yup.string() .min(2, "Too Short!") .max(50, "Too Long!") .required("Required"), website: Yup.string() .min(2, "Too Short!") .max(50, "Too Long!") .required("Required"), }); export class Reactstrap extends Component { render() { return (
{ //alert("Form Gönderildi.") console.log(values); }} > {({ values, errors, touched, handleChange, handleBlur, handleSubmit, isSubmitting, }) => (

Contact Us


{errors.name && ( {errors.name} )}

When is the best time of day to reach you?
)}
); } } export default Reactstrap;
